alert.note: Alert for Botetourt (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Botetourt County through 300 PM EDT... At 227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Daleville, or over Troutville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troutville... Fincastle... Nace... Laymantown... Daleville... Lithia... and Blue Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
